callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | CcoCampaignMilitaryForceRetinueSlot => IsConvalescing | CcoCampaignPostBattleUnit => IsDead | self.IsVisible

default.name: default
default.tooltip: This unit is convalescing and will return in the number of turns displayed.

post_battle.name: post_battle
post_battle.tooltip: This unit has been destroyed in battle.

individual_kills.componentleveltooltip: The number of entities this unit has killed in this battle.

refund_overlay.componentleveltooltip: Left-click to refund\nThis unit can be refunded until the end of the turn, [[b]]or[[/b]] you order the army to move.

health_bar_parent_postbattle.comment: Added for postbattle, not ideal that dupe but quickest fix for now. Could have used GetIf and runtime objedct perhaps on other health bar, but it also needs to update constantly. This is safest and most bug free route at late stage.
